title: Django Tutorial: Complete Guide
excerpt: Comprehensive Django tutorial covering installation, project structure, models, views, templates, forms, authentication, and more.

title: Support Vector Machines From Scratch
excerpt: Complete guide to SVMs: maximum margin classifiers, kernel trick, soft margins, and Python implementation from scratch.

title: Logistic Regression From Scratch

title: Linear Regression From Scratch
excerpt: Complete guide: OLS, Ridge, Lasso, Polynomial Regression, and Feature Scaling with Python implementations from scratch.
